JUICE BEAUTY Stem Cellular Vinifera Replenishing Oil

Brand: Juice Beauty

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Helianthus annus (sunflower) seed oil, jojoba esters, vitis vinifera (grape) seed oil, simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, punica granatum (pomegranate) seed oil, jojoba oil/macadamia seed oil esters, phytosteryl macad
book: 0562-JUICE BEAUTY Stem Cellular Vinifera Replenishing Oil

chunk: s, phytosteryl macadamiate, phytosterols, malus domestica (apple) fruit cell culture extract, vitis vinifera (grape) fruit cell extract, citrus medica limonum (lemon) leaf cell extract, squalene, ascorbyl palmitate (Vitamin C), tocopherol (Vitamin E), isomalt, lecithin phospholipid, xanthan gum, citrus reticulata (mandarin) oil, cinnamomum camphora
book: 0562-JUICE BEAUTY Stem Cellular Vinifera Replenishing Oil

chunk:
cinnamomum camphora (ho wood) oil, litsea cubeba (may chang) fruit oil

Directions: Shake thoroughly to mix dual-phase jojoba swirls. For priming, apply a light layer evenly to face and neck, allowing oil to fully absorb before applying makeup. For ultimate hydration, moisturize by warming oil in palms before gently pressing into face, neck and dé
book: 0562-JUICE BEAUTY Stem Cellular Vinifera Replenishing Oil

chunk:
to face, neck and décolleté areas.

Warnings: For external use only. Do not broken or irritated skin. Discontinue if irritation occurs. Avoid contact with the eyes.
book: 0562-JUICE BEAUTY Stem Cellular Vinifera Replenishing Oil
